data.message: Hey, I don't even think you will see this, but anyway, I am from NZ, am holding a conference next year for all who work with young people, in particular those who have experience hardship and have overcome these obstacles to be successful, would love to have you, you would probaby cost a fortune, but in NZ I could show you and your daughter what a beautiful country this is without too much hassel, our locals are pretty good and if you want to relax and not be harassed then I could make you a deal if you are interested...
